scalar, vector or matrix of real or complex numbers

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This is an Octave function. This function resamples in the input sequence x supplied by a factor of p/q. If x is a matrix, then every column is resampled.hange the sample rate of x by a factor of p/q. This is performed using a polyphase algorithm. The impulse response h, given as parameter 4, of the antialiasing filter is either specified or designed with a Kaiser-windowed sinecard.
